note:
A jay who lived down on the farm come into see the town
Registered at Smith's hotel as Mr Hayseed Brown
A jay he was, so y'all admit, with whiskers green as grass
Pulled off his shoes, jumped into bed, and then blew out the gas

And he never came back
He never came back
And as they broke down the door
Oh, the last words he said
Just before he dropped dead
Were "we'll meet on that beautiful shore"
